notes.body: Hello Aditya,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I am sorry to hear that you wish to delete your account with PharmEasy. Please note that currently, we do not have a facility to delete the account from our database; however, we can deactivate your account. We will be unable to activate it later, and it will be deactivated permanently.     Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account       Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.     Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Aditya,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I am sorry to hear that you wish to delete your account with PharmEasy. Please note that currently, we do not have a facility to delete the account from our database; however, we can deactivate your account. We will be unable to activate it later, and it will be deactivated permanently.

Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account  

Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.

Awaiting your earliest response.

Regards,
Habiba

helpdesk_ticket.description:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Pankaj Agrawal <pankajagrawal8890@gmail.com>
Date: Sat, Dec 13, 2025 at 2:48 PM
Subject: Urgent Complaint - Medicine Order Delayed Beyond Promised Delivery
(Order #654897490120146944)
To: <care@pharmeasy.in>


Hello Pharmeasy team,

I placed a medicine order on 2nd December, with your platform clearly
promising delivery between 7th and 9th December. Trusting this timeline, I
proceeded with the purchase. Today is 13th December, and I still have not
received my order—over 11 days past the promised window.

Yesterday evening, I connected with your support executive, who explicitly
promised delivery by today (13th December) by 1:00 PM. When I reconnected
just now, your team is still in complete confusion and has no idea when the
parcel will actually arrive—this is beyond incompetence.

I have contacted your customer support multiple times (at least 2-3
occasions), including urgently on the night of 9th December when I
emphasized the critical medical need for these medicines. Unfortunately,
your team has failed to provide any proper explanation, satisfactory
resolution, or even basic awareness of your internal processes. They
admitted being unable to contact the delivery company, which is completely
unacceptable for a service handling essential healthcare items.

As a software engineer, if you fail to deliver my order by today 6:00 PM, I
will sue your platform on social media and expose this negligence to
thousands—your reputation will be destroyed.

This level of incompetence and disregard for customers in genuine medical
emergencies is outrageous and fraudulent. If this is the standard of your
service, I strongly suggest you shut down operations immediately rather
than continue misleading and exploiting vulnerable people who rely on
timely medicine delivery. Your platform's poor tech infrastructure also
lacks a proper public review system, preventing others from seeing your
true ratings and avoiding being trapped like I was.

I demand immediate action: full refund, expedited delivery if possible, and
a detailed explanation within 24 hours. Failure to resolve this will force
me to escalate to consumer protection authorities, share my experience
publicly on social media and review sites, and warn others about your
unreliable service.

I am sharing this email becuase i am not able to find and review system
even with my order details page on your website.

Respond immediately or face the consequences.
Regards :


[image: image.png]

-- 
*Pankaj Agrawal*
*(Software Engineer)*


-- 
*Pankaj Agrawal*
*(Software Engineer)*

--

notes.body: Hello Rahul,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #657619666746544128-39878.     We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered to you. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. notes.body: Hello ​Avneet,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #657799274469208064-38161, I am sorry to know you have not received your medicine DR. MOREPEN GLUCO ONE BLOOD GLUCOSE TEST STRIP | BG-03 | 50 NO'S 3 quantities. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     I have highlighted the issue to the Escalations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.     The issue is being investigated, this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will initiate a refund against the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our Partner Retailer.     Please confirm whether the parcel was intact or if any damage was there from the outside at the time of delivery.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello ​Avneet,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #657799274469208064-38161, I am sorry to know you have not received your medicine DR. MOREPEN GLUCO ONE BLOOD GLUCOSE TEST STRIP | BG-03 | 50 NO'S 3 quantities. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.

I have highlighted the issue to the Escalations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.

The issue is being investigated, this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will initiate a refund against the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our Partner Retailer.

Please confirm whether the parcel was intact or if any damage was there from the outside at the time of delivery.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Santu,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regard to your order #657799274469208064-38161, as checked your concern was highlighted for the missing item.We apologize for any inconvenience caused to you with your order.     We have received an update from our escalations team and have discussed the matter with our team member. According to the update, all medicines were packed and dispatched correctly. Regrettably, we are unable to fulfill your refund request.      Please be informed that the update was shared with you after a thorough check.     We highly appreciate your understanding in this regard.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Santu,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regard to your order #657799274469208064-38161, as checked your concern was highlighted for the missing item.We apologize for any inconvenience caused to you with your order.
 
We have received an update from our escalations team and have discussed the matter with our team member. According to the update, all medicines were packed and dispatched correctly. Regrettably, we are unable to fulfill your refund request. 
 
Please be informed that the update was shared with you after a thorough check.
 
We highly appreciate your understanding in this regard.
 
We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hello Pharmeasy team,

I placed a medicine order on 2nd December, with your platform clearly
promising delivery between 7th and 9th December. Trusting this timeline, I
proceeded with the purchase. Today is 13th December, and I still have not
received my order—over 11 days past the promised window.

Yesterday evening, I connected with your support executive, who explicitly
promised delivery by today (13th December) by 1:00 PM. When I reconnected
just now, your team is still in complete confusion and has no idea when the
parcel will actually arrive—this is beyond incompetence.

I have contacted your customer support multiple times (at least 2-3
occasions), including urgently on the night of 9th December when I
emphasized the critical medical need for these medicines. Unfortunately,
your team has failed to provide any proper explanation, satisfactory
resolution, or even basic awareness of your internal processes. They
admitted being unable to contact the delivery company, which is completely
unacceptable for a service handling essential healthcare items.

As a software engineer, if you fail to deliver my order by today 6:00 PM, I
will sue your platform on social media and expose this negligence to
thousands—your reputation will be destroyed.

This level of incompetence and disregard for customers in genuine medical
emergencies is outrageous and fraudulent. If this is the standard of your
service, I strongly suggest you shut down operations immediately rather
than continue misleading and exploiting vulnerable people who rely on
timely medicine delivery. Your platform's poor tech infrastructure also
lacks a proper public review system, preventing others from seeing your
true ratings and avoiding being trapped like I was.

I demand immediate action: full refund, expedited delivery if possible, and
a detailed explanation within 24 hours. Failure to resolve this will force
me to escalate to consumer protection authorities, share my experience
publicly on social media and review sites, and warn others about your
unreliable service.

I am sharing this email becuase i am not able to find and review system
even with my order details page on your website.

Respond immediately or face the consequences.
Regards :


[image: image.png]

-- 
*Pankaj Agrawal*
*(Software Engineer)*

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Urgent Complaint - Medicine Order Delayed Beyond Promised Delivery (Order #654897490120146944)
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hello Pharmeasy team,
I placed a medicine order on 2nd December, with your platform clearly promising delivery between 7th and 9th December. Trusting this timeline, I proceeded with the purchase. Today is 13th December, and I still have not received my order—over 11 days past the promised window.
Yesterday evening, I connected with your support executive, who explicitly promised delivery by today (13th December) by 1:00 PM. When I reconnected just now, your team is still in complete confusion and has no idea when the parcel will actually arrive—this is beyond incompetence.
I have contacted your customer support multiple times (at least 2-3 occasions), including urgently on the night of 9th December when I emphasized the critical medical need for these medicines. Unfortunately, your team has failed to provide any proper explanation, satisfactory resolution, or even basic awareness of your internal processes. They admitted being unable to contact the delivery company, which is completely unacceptable for a service handling essential healthcare items.
As a software engineer, if you fail to deliver my order by today 6:00 PM, I will sue your platform on social media and expose this negligence to thousands—your reputation will be destroyed.
This level of incompetence and disregard for customers in genuine medical emergencies is outrageous and fraudulent. If this is the standard of your service, I strongly suggest you shut down operations immediately rather than continue misleading and exploiting vulnerable people who rely on timely medicine delivery. Your platform's poor tech infrastructure also lacks a proper public review system, preventing others from seeing your true ratings and avoiding being trapped like I was.
I demand immediate action: full refund, expedited delivery if possible, and a detailed explanation within 24 hours. Failure to resolve this will force me to escalate to consumer protection authorities, share my experience publicly on social media and review sites, and warn others about your unreliable service.
I am sharing this email becuase i am not able to find and review system even with my order details page on your website.
Respond immediately or face the consequences.
Regards : 




--
Pankaj Agrawal
(Software Engineer)

Hello Ravi,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #655071422060167168-47573, I see your order has been dispatched, and it is being delivered by a courier partner. Due to some unforeseen circumstances, the estimated date for the delivery of your order has been changed. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As checked, your concern is already highlighted to the Courier team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them. For any update, you can refer to Escalated ticket #22260441.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Habiba

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Sir/Ma'am,

I placed order for a medicine named rybelsus 7mg on October 23 with order
id 640358143889530880 and delivered order on 27th October but I received an
empty box of medicine for which I complaint on next day but no resolution
provided yet.

The product is pick up by courier but not marked pickup as they said box is
empty and issue is currently pending with esclation team but they are not

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Fraud With Customers_Rybelsus medicine_Empty box
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear Sir/Ma'am, 

I placed order for a medicine named rybelsus 7mg on October 23 with order id 640358143889530880 and delivered order on 27th October but I received an empty box of medicine for which I complaint on next day but no resolution provided yet. 

The product is pick up by courier but not marked pickup as they said box is empty and issue is currently pending with esclation team but they are not providing solutions and extending issue by just saying we are not able to confirm with courier as this is external vendor so why you are using there services if you not able to confirm from last one month. 

I received call today from esclation team that you need to provide call recording with courier team then I said fine will provide you the call recordings and request to provide the link where I can share but esclation team confirm to provide whatsApp link but no link provide till the time writing you the email. 

I'm just fed up with following up since long time. I request to provide solution kn priority basis other wise I will file suit with consumer court for maladide and fraud practices happening with customers and unable to get resolutions from very long time. 

I hope you can understand my problem and provide resolutions as earliest. 

Thanking you, 
Shivam
9872035959
